content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 26}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft light_gray_wool, I need to craft white_wool first. To craft white_wool, I need to place string in the crafting grid. I will start by moving string from slot 27 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 26}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: I have moved one string to slot 1. I need to place 4 strings in the crafting grid to craft white_wool, therefore I will move another string to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 26}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: I have moved two strings to slots 1 and 2. I need to place 4 strings in the crafting grid to craft white_wool, therefore I will move another string to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 26}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: I have moved three strings to slots 1, 2 and 4. I need to place 4 strings in the crafting grid to craft white_wool, therefore I will move the last string to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 26}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: I have placed all the strings in the crafting grid, and now I need to move the crafted white_wool to an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 26}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]

thought: Now that I have crafted white_wool, I can craft light_gray_wool. To craft light_gray_wool, I need to place light_gray_dye and white_wool in the crafting grid. I will start by moving light_gray_dye from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 26}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: I have moved light_gray_dye to slot 1. Now I need to move white_wool to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 26}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have moved both light_gray_dye and white_wool to the crafting grid, I can craft light_gray_wool. I will move the crafted light_gray_wool to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
